scripts.deploy: echo 'Deploy to GitHub Pages - push to main branch'
scripts.deploy:git: git add . && git commit -m 'chore: update site' && git push origin main
scripts.init:git: git init && git add . && git commit -m 'chore: initial commit' && git branch -M main && git remote add origin https://github.com/jannivsce666/helionisneu.git && git push -u origin main
